name: botbuilder-dialogs-declarative
author: Microsoft Corp.
description: Declarative library for the Microsoft BotBuilder dialog system.

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint botbuilder-dialogs-adaptive --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\doc\botbuilder-dialogs .\lib\index.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder SDK - Dialogs" --readme none
